title: I have to miss Friday Prayer due to class, am I sinful? assimalhakeem JAL
transcript: Aran from kazakistan is it or um who's with us I have a hard question I have classes I have classes sheduled during Juma and I find it difficult to attend the prayer without missing import lectures where do you live where do you live and how can I balance without compromising on my religious duties where do you live in Kazakhstan okay and they don't break for Salat like Muslims no they are not okay if they do not break for Salat and they don't give you time to pray and you have to do your studies in order to live in progress in life life because you are the bread winner in this case it is permissible for you to skip Salat and try your level best to squeeze time to go and pray jum with other students or in the Masjid afterwards or do your level best to do it to the best of your ability and Allah is most forgiving most merciful
